== Bio ==
Director, Dr. Riitta Maijala leads the Science Policy Section of the
Department of Higher Education and Science Policy, Ministry of Education
and Culture in Finland and is in charge of drafting and implementing
strategies of science, research and innovation policies and use of
scientific knowledge. Previously she has worked as Director, Professor,
Head of Unit and researcher in the EU and national organizations. She
has been the chair and member of many international and national
committees and working groups.
